sentences.en: " Oh, if you are going to be hateful and rude enough to bring that up again!
sentences.cn: " 啊, 看你再敢那么可恨,那么放肆地提起这件事来!

sentences.en: A hateful person is one that arouses feelings of hatred in you.
sentences.cn: 可憎之人就是会使你产生憎恨之情的人.

sentences.en: All tyranny is hateful to us.
sentences.cn: 我们对一切暴政都深恶痛绝.

sentences.en: But, in very truth, she is right as regards this hateful token.
sentences.cn: 不过, 的的确确, 她对这可恨的标记的看法是没错的.

sentences.en: He foresaw that I should grow hateful to myself.
sentences.cn: 他预感到我会痛恨自己的!

sentences.en: He had eradicated abnormal instincts and thus delivered not a few from a hateful bondage.
sentences.cn: 他根除了反常的禀性,帮不少人卸下了可怕的负担.

sentences.en: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

sentences.en: It was all the fault of that hateful man!
sentences.cn: 都是那个可恶的人造的孽！

sentences.en: It was at present a place perfectly accordant with man's nature -- neither ghastly, hateful, nor ugly.
sentences.cn: 现在这块地方,和人的性情十二分地融洽 -- 既不可怕, 又不可畏, 也不可厌.

sentences.en: She could hardly spit out the hateful words.
sentences.cn: 她恼怒得几乎无法骂出那句充满恨意的话来.

sentences.en: She gave him a hateful look.
sentences.cn: 她恶狠狠地看了他一眼.

sentences.en: That hateful twenty - seventh still preyed on his mind.
sentences.cn: 还是没办法,还是得为那个可恨的二十七发愁.

sentences.en: The night was turning jangled and hateful to him as the twilight faded.
sentences.cn: 夜色渐浓,在他看来黑夜变得越来越可怕可恨了.

sentences.en: Theft is something that really disgusts me. It makes me feel hateful towards this whole wretched island.
sentences.cn: 偷窃是让我深恶痛绝的事情，它让我对这整个该死的岛都充满仇视。

sentences.en: These are not necessarily hateful, malicious people.
sentences.cn: 这些人不一定心怀仇恨，恶意伤人。

sentences.en: This is hateful to Jehovah, who will certainly punish the land.
sentences.cn: 这是耶和华所厌恶的, 他必须降祸于这块土地.
